title: Google Maps Advanced Scraper
description: Extract data from Google Maps for businesses, places and locations

searchTab.title: Search Settings
searchTab.description: Configure how to find places on Google Maps

searchStringsArray.title: Search terms
searchStringsArray.description: List of search terms to use (will run multiple searches)

customGeolocation.title: Custom geolocation
customGeolocation.description: Define a specific area to search in using coordinates

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Direct URLs to Google Maps places (skips search)

limitTab.title: Limits
limitTab.description: Control how many results to collect

maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.title: Maximum places per search term
maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.description: Maximum number of places to extract per search keyword (0 = unlimited)

maxCrawledPlaces.title: Maximum places total
maxCrawledPlaces.description: Total maximum number of places to extract across all searches (0 = unlimited)

maxCostPerRun.title: Maximum cost per run ($)
maxCostPerRun.description: Estimated maximum cost for this run (0 = unlimited)

detailsTab.title: Data to Extract
detailsTab.description: Configure what data to extract from each place

scrapeContacts.title: Extract contact information
scrapeContacts.description: Get phone, website, email from places

scrapePlaceDetailPage.title: Extract full place details
scrapePlaceDetailPage.description: Get complete information about each place

skipClosedPlaces.title: Skip permanently closed places
skipClosedPlaces.description: Don't extract data from closed businesses

maxImages.title: Maximum images per place
maxImages.description: Number of images to download per place (0 = none)

maxReviews.title: Maximum reviews per place
maxReviews.description: Number of reviews to extract per place (0 = none)

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code for Google Maps interface (en, ro, fr, etc.)
